transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Shadab bol raha hu sir India Mart se account manager.
Customer: Ji hai.
Executive: Sir abhi aapne haal hi mein India Mart se subscription liya hai na sir?
Customer: Haan liya tha.
Executive: To sir uske liye sir welcome call one video meet generate hoti hai. To aapki jo profile hai sir mujhe hand over ki gayi thi.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Pehla aapki jo profile thi wo mujhe hand over ki gayi thi. Main Mohammad Shadab bol raha hu sir. To jo bhi aapki services jo bhi aapki services hongi India Mart ki sir wo main take care karunga ek saal tak.
Customer: To iske liye pata kya hota hai sir? To mere account manager aap honge?
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Sir aapka jo na jaise hi aapki awaaz
Customer: Aapki awaaz kat rahi hai bhaiya.
Executive: Sir awaaz nahi aa rahi bhaiya?
Customer: Awaaz bilkul bhi nahi aa rahi, awaaz kat rahi hai aapki.
Executive: Haan par abhi aa rahi hai abhi?
Customer: Aa rahi hai boliye.
Executive: Haan to sir iske liye pata hai kya hota hai ki ek welcome call one generate hoti hai jisme basic si cheeze hoti hai ki matlab kya kya cheeze kaise India Mart ki services wagera use karte hain.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Might bhi aapko malum ho kaise use karte hain lekin sir aur jo thoda bahut bhi rehta hai usko usko cover up karte hain isse aur ye mandatory hoti hai sir.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Haan to iska sir main aapko aapki register mail id pe jo aapne India Mart mein de rakha hai. Haan usme main aapko ek video meet ki link share karunga usko aap join kar lijiyega. Video meet video meet ki link share karunga usko aap join kar lijiyega. Haan to sir waha pe jitni bhi cheeze hongi main aapko guide kar dunga.
Customer: Wo to kal baat ho gayi thi meri.
Executive: Sir kal baat ho gayi thi sir video
Customer: Sir video meeting ho gayi thi.
Executive: Sir wo aapne dekhiye pehle aap basic
Customer: Fir pehle ya fir uske baad TrustSeal mein aaye honge na?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Abhi aapne
Customer: Nahi wo to pehle hi hua tha jo aap bol rahe the na wo wo sab saari cheeze kar li thi.
Executive: Nahi agar sir TrustSeal jab aap lete hain na to aapka sir ye photo jo aapka jo shop ka sir jo banner wagera hoga saari cheeze aap dikhai hongi na kal aapne?
Customer: Haan haan banner wagera sab saari cheeze dikhai thi.
Executive: Haan to sir wo video meet jo hoti hai na wo hoti hai ki matlab jo TrustSeal certificate nahi deta India Mart ek aapke yaha pe product ka naam aata hai aur ek jo hai aapke ghar pe bhejta hai wo video meet hui thi uske regarding pe.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: To unhone saari cheeze aapko dekhi hongi ki kaha pe aapka organization hai. Haan kaha pe aapki shop hai ye saari cheeze verification ke liye unhone call kiya hoga aapko. To unhone saari unhone saari cheeze dekhi hongi aur jo main hu sir wo matlab wo log ko ek bar connect kiya connect karne ke baad aapki jo background tha jitna business tha usko verify kiya verify karne ke baad ab waha se ye log ok kar denge ki haan jo business hai wo exist karta hai is location pe saari cheeze to wo log ab aapse connect nahi karenge ab aaj ke baad se connect karunga sir ek saal tak main aapse.
Customer: To to aap mujhe aap mujhe apna personal number do sabse pehle do taki main aapko direct call laga saku.
Executive: Haan sir aap ek kaam kariye video call pe aa jaiye main wahin pe aapko pata hai whatsapp kar deta hu. Haan whatsapp whatsapp mera personal number rahega. Haan to aap whatsapp pe karoge ki kis pe karoge?
Customer: Haan to aap whatsapp pe karoge ki kis pe karoge?
Executive: Haan sir ye aapki jo mail id hai na India Mart mein register jo aapne karwaya hai abhi to maine dekha nahi sir jab main link generate karunga tab mujhe pata chalega ki kaun si id hai India Mart mein aapki register hai. To usi pe aapko mail aayega to wo mail wo mail se aap usko join kar lijiyega. To main apni sir aap mostly kis pe use karte hain mobile phone pe ki laptop pe?
Customer: Mobile pe mobile pe. Mobile pe mobile phone pe. Haan to sir mobile phone mein main aapko waha pe guide karunga ki mobile phone pe kaise kya karte hain kya nahi karte. Sir isse pehle aap basic chalate the kya?
Executive: Haan to sir mobile phone mein main aapko waha pe guide karunga ki mobile phone pe kaise kya karte hain kya nahi karte. Sir isse pehle aap basic chalate the kya?
Customer: Haan pehle basic chalata tha main.
Executive: Haan waha pe mujhko next wagera dikha tha monthly wala shayad.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Monthly wala package use karte the na isse pehle aap?
Customer: Haan pehle monthly wala tha.
Executive: Haan to sir usi ke regarding matlab jo dekhiye monthly se aur annually se sir zameen aasman ki zameen aasman mein fark hota hai.
Customer: Koi baat nahi.
Executive: Aapne liya hai TrustSeal basic wala plan bhi nahi liya ki jo basic wala ek saal ka plan hota hai usko bhi nahi liya aapne liya hai TrustSeal. To sir aur kya fark hoga to sir isme kitni buyleads milti hain kitni buyleads nahi milti. Haan kab aati hain kab lapse hoti hain kitni aapko consume karna hai ki matlab business mile. Kyunki sir aapka business jo hai na makrana ka hai sir waha pe competition bahut jyada hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Haan to sir wahi saari cheeze main aapko guide karunga.
Customer: To sir ek kaam karta hu main aapko pata hai
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji boliye.
Executive: Haan no
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Haan main ye generate karke aapko bhej deta hu. Main dekh leta hu kaun si mail id hai jispe aapko aayega receive hoga.
Customer: Ek minute bhaiya.
Customer: Haan ji boliye.
Executive: Main mail id bata raha hu sir aapko maine share kiya hai ki kis mail id pe aapko aaya hoga.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: India ye khansuhail682@gmail.com
Executive: Ye yaha pe register mail id hai sir aapka.
Customer: Wapas boliye.
Executive: Khan Sohail
Customer: Haan Khan Sohail 682@gmail.com
Executive: Haan ispe sir wo India Mart ki taraf se ek aapko mail aaya hoga.
Customer: Dekhta hu.
Customer: Kya naam se aaya hai?
Customer: Bahar India Mart andar Mohammad Shadab hoga.
Customer: Kahe nahi Shadab bhai.
Customer: Mere to bas ye kya bolte hain ye apne kal wala hi mention karta hai.
Customer: Aa gaya aa gaya aa gaya Mohammad Shadab.
Executive: Ji ji.
Executive: Isko aap join kar lijiyega.

(silence)
[No transcript available]
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's voice was breaking during the call.

- Wants executive's personal number for direct contact.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed he is the account manager.

- Explained the purpose of the welcome call and video meet.

- Executive offered to share his WhatsApp number.

- Executive identified the customer's registered email ID.

- Executive asked the customer to join the meeting.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send a video meet link.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, trustseal, buyleads, welcome call
